name: Idea no Hana
nutshell: Azurite, an orphan taken in by a group of traveling entertainers, has always been able to see spirits that others can't. When he was four, two traveling doctors, who seemed to have the same ability he had, healed one of their troupe members. They left, but people who seemed to either be them, or be exactly like them, showed up seven years later. This time, they joined the troupe as two entertainers, Ruby and Sand. Ruby and Sand were kind of mysterious, and held themselves a bit away from the rest of the troupe, but Azurite was determined to get to know them. Through his relationship with them, he hopes to learn much more about his abilities and the supernatural part of the world that they both experience.

name: Zetsumetsu Doubutsu Monogatari
nutshell:
Stories of animals ruthlessly exterminated by humans.
The dodo, Steller's sea cow, the Japanese wolf......... gone from the Earth. Eight species of birds and animals made extinct by humans. This story depicts the circumstances that led to their extinction and what humans did to them. When our primitive ancestors wiped out the wooly mammoth, it was for survival. But the animals in this book died out due to human greed, vanity, and ego. Through these extinct animals, we see the dark side of the human heart.
(Source: Shogakukan, translated)

name: The Careful Empress
nutshell:
The world's strongest white dragon… becomes the tyrant's wife?
Betrayed by her only friend, she is given a new lease on life reborn as the daughter of the knight who killed her. How will she take her revenge on those who have wronged her?

name: The People That Are Hard to Throw Away
nutshell: The story follows Yūsuke Mamiana, an unemployed, broke simpleton who is obsessed with sex, after he returns to his hometown. While there, he encounters the bruised Kyōko, the only person who does not judge him. The two begin living together and work toward finding the meaning of happiness for each of them.

name: Granblue Fantasy - Uncle Cali 4koma
nutshell: http://www.pixiv.net/member_illust.php?mode=medium&illust_id=59428908

name: Valkyrie Drive Siren -Break Out-
nutshell: Based on Valkyrie Drive: Siren mobile game.

name: Yamada-kun to 7-nin no Majo
nutshell: Ryu Yamada is a second year student at Suzaku High. Ryu is always late for school, naps in class and gets abysmal grades. His life is a dead bore. The beautiful Urara Shiraishi, on the other hand, is Suzaku High's brightest student. One day, without explanation, their bodies are swapped! Ryu ends up in Urara's body, and Urara in Ryu's.

name: Daidai wa, Hantoumei ni Nidone Suru
nutshell: The bizarre everyday life stories of the citizens of a coastal port town, Daidai.

name: Cat, Child, and Mother
nutshell: To make amends at the ends of one's life or to seek reconciliation while you still can.

name: Haru Machi Sakura no Mau Koro ni
nutshell: High-School girl Akari is 17 years old and doesn't know what she wants to do in the future. One day, on her way to school, she gets hits by car and wakes up possessed by the spirit of an actress who wants a little more time to bring her life to closure before she passes on.

name: Muddy
nutshell: Clay, a child prodigy, was hired at the age of 14 to become a professor to make chimeras, creatures made with a fusion of various materials. However, after he was hired, he was unable to meet the expectations of the company that hired him and was fired. He comes upon an abandoned research facility and creates a human child chimera and names him Muddy. Together, they will go out into the world and find out what Muddy is capable of.

name: Memoirs of Kanglim
nutshell:
Lee Harin is a model student in his school who has an all perfect face, education, and personality. But one day he had a dream of changing his tedious life.
The next day, a strange transfer student comes and sits next to him. But he suddenly said he’s going to kill Harin that day.
Harin, who’s troubled by the transfer student who chases him around threatening to kill him, begs for forgiveness. But the transfer student gets mad saying that he needs to get his revenge.
Can Harin overcome this crisis?!

name: Mega Man Nanomix - When the DUST settles.
nutshell: A short story collection project by Ariga Hitoshi that was prepared some time after the release of Rockman Gigamix but shelved for various reasons.

name: The Oppressed Daughter Became the Master of Yggdrasil
nutshell:
The girl, Fiore, is a countess's daughter and yet she is treated unfairly. Every day she endures terrible punishments, including the breaking of her engagement and the setting on fire of a young tree that was a memento of her late mother.
One day, however, a handsome young stranger appears in front of her. His name is Alm. He is the incarnation of Yggdrasil that protects the world,  and Fiore is his master...
A Cinderella fantasy about the power and destiny hidden in an oppressed girl.

name: Don't Provoke a Reborned Bamboo Horse
tags: Reincarnation,Long Strip,Romance,Boys' Love,School Life,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color,Tragedy
nutshell:
Qiao Yu, the man I humbly guarded for more than 10 years, unexpectedly cheated in front of me!
This is not the worst part. While I was fleeing from the difficult situation, I had an accident with the elevator. I fell into darkness together with the elevator. When I woke up again, I'm back to where I first meet him!
Qiao Yu, if I'm unable to avoid meeting you once again, I'll make sure to protect my heart and never to fall in love with you again! Remember!
It's not wise to provoke your bamboo horse.
Español
Yu Qiao, el hombre al que he estado protegiendo humildemente durante más de diez años, ¡me engañó delante de mí! Eso no fue lo peor de todo. Mientras huía desesperadamente, tuve un accidente en el ascensor. Caí en la oscuridad junto con el ascensor. ¡Al despertar de nuevo, había regresado al momentos antes de conocerlo! Yu Qiao, si realmente no puedo evitar encontrarme contigo de nuevo, me aseguraré de proteger mi corazón y de no enamorarme otra vez de ti. ¡Nunca más tendré nada que ver contigo! ¡Recuerda! ¡No hay que meterse con tu caballo de bambú!

name: Mega Man X4
nutshell: The battle group Repliforce has turned against humanity. What is it that has driven these proud people to such insane actions? What path should X and Zero take? A deadly fight unfolds in the midst of unprecedented chaos as the sentiments of each combatant intersect.

name: Happy-Go-Lucky Days
nutshell:
Collection of mildly erotic short stories about various sides of human's relationships and their sexuality.
Volume 1:

Scene 1
About one night stand that turns into something more.
Scene 2
About a boy in need of attention and a girl in need of love.
Scene 3
About a woman, her strange roommate and a blind date.
Scene 4
About schoolteacher, his sister and the sister's boyfriend. (features the couple from scene 1)
Omake 1 - Belief in Being Bare
Omake 2 - Happy Ending
Omake 3 - Even Though You're a Teacher (Sensei no Kuseni)

Volume 2:

Scene 5
About a woman who goes to the wedding of a woman she was in love with back in school and ends up hooking up with another woman there (who also happens to be in love with the woman getting married).

CHN
||时而甜蜜，时而痛苦 这就是恋爱中的日常
无论对方是谁，无论以什么形式，所有的恋爱和生活方式都有同等的价值
然后，笨拙地想着某个人的日子，总有一天会成为可爱的回忆
志村貴子老师以独特的节奏和细微的心理描述为我们描绘了一些不寻常的浪漫和平凡的日常生活||

name: Nostalgio no Kaze
nutshell: Webcomic made for advertisement of the game.

name: A Curse Beyond the Witch's Intentions
nutshell:
"Ray is a knight who got cursed by a witch and for the sake of living a happy life with his lover, Emil, he will do anything to undo the damned curse!"
(Rose Squad Scans)

name: Mabataki Dekinai
nutshell:
A collection of stories published in Comic Yuri Hime by Yukio Yuki

Kokoro Login
Yumemi Gachi Destroy
Kyou, Kimi ni Furaremasu
Gal no Uchi to Class no Jimiko
Lonely Heart Online
Tsunori Tsunoru

name: Kazoku Gokko
nutshell: Toki loves his childhood friend Hisamitsu. He decides to keep his feelings hidden to be able to stay by his side. So he's watching him getting married and having a child, but then…

name: 17-sai.
nutshell:
This is the story of a terrible kidnapping and gang rape crime committed against a 17-old-girl, by 17-year-old boys. Why did such a thing happen? Why was no one able to prevent it?
BIG WARNING: Not for the faint hearted, based on a real life case.

name: Dekiru Danjo no Dekinai Koi
nutshell: Mikoto Torii, who works for a major consulting firm, is a high-spec girl who is admired by both men and women. However, Mikoto's weakness is... "love". Mikoto feels depressed after her breakup, but suddenly her colleague, Yusuke Miyazono, makes an appearance!?

name: Hatsukoi no Sekai
nutshell: Kaoru Komatsu acaba de cumplir 40 años, lo cual para ella es un duro golpe ya que "la mitad de su vida se ha ido"; es soltera, hermosa y una gerente diligente en una cadena de cafeterías. De repente se le da notificación que debe transferirse a una sucursal en la zona rural para mejorar sus ventas. Allí encontrará un nuevo reto, a pesar de ya tener 40 años… ¿Su vida da un nuevo comienzo?

name: Sura's Lover
nutshell:
Deep in the mountains is a village that offers prayers to the mythical Asura/Sura in order to stay protected. Doctor ‘Cho-ah’ who lives in the doctor’s town ends up saving a mysterious man named ‘Mujin.’
This encounter marks the end of Cho-ah's peaceful days as he gets caught up in a whirlwind of events.

name: Chocolate Vampire
nutshell:
This school is funded by Kagari Ritsuki family. Yuki is the youngest child of Kagari Ritsuki brothers, and and idol in the school. On the other hand, Kashiwagi Chiyo hates Yuki…
The truth is Yuki is a vampire, and he always drink Chiyo’s blood. Why does she give her blood to someone that she hates? Is there any secret between those two?
